title: Simplify Development Task Interface
description: As a project manager, I want to remove clutter from Development Task cards so that I can focus on essential information without visual distractions.
iWant: to remove clutter from Development Task cards
soThat: I can focus on essential information without visual distractions

acceptanceTests.title: Remove Branch Link
acceptanceTests.description: Given I view a Development Task card, when I examine the interface, then the Branch link should not be visible

acceptanceTests.title: Remove PR Status Text
acceptanceTests.description: Given I view a Development Task card, when I examine the interface, then the 'PR created and ready for development' text should not be displayed

acceptanceTests.title: Remove Rebase Link
acceptanceTests.description: Given I view a Development Task card, when I examine the interface, then the Rebase link should not be visible

acceptanceTests.title: Clean Interface Verification
acceptanceTests.description: Given I view a Development Task card, when I examine the simplified interface, then only essential task information should be displayed
